item.title: Projects
item.description: 2018 Acyl - Testing Environments On Demand. Build dynamic testing environments in Kubernetes, triggered by GitHub Pull Requests. Metahelm - Install and upgrade dependency graphs of Helm charts. 2017 Crudite - CRDTs backed by Kafka. PVC - Generic applications secrets library with backends for Vault, environment variables and JSON files. dynamo-drift - Migrations and ETL for DynamoDB tables. 2016 Furan - Horizontally-scalable Docker image build and push GRPC service, utilizing Cassandra and Kafka.
